class.description: The internal class represented by this file.

player.description: A path or URL linking to an entity file to represent the player. The entity's "collidable" attribute will be ignored.

values.description: A path or URL linking to an entity file.

entities.description: An array of entities to be accessible while this room is loaded.

hitbox.description: How this room's hitbox is placed.

x.description: The bottom edge of the hitbox.

y.description: The left edge of the hitbox.

w.description: The horizontal size of the hitbox, extending to the right.

h.description: The vertical size of the hitbox, extending upwards.
